clang-analyzer-webkit.NoUncountedMemberC.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-webkit.NoUncountedMemberChecker
Check for no uncounted member variables.
The
clang-analyzer-webkit.NoUncountedMemberChecker
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-webkit.NoUncountedMemberC.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
